content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1562758262337{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_single_image image=”18154″ img_size=”full”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1661771791915{margin-top: 10px !important;margin-bottom: 30px !important;padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_column width=”2/3″][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1661771738923{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;}”]When it comes to top-quality gym flooring services, Fitness World is a name to rely on! Over the years, we have catered commercial grade gym flooring solutions to commercial gyms, educational institutions/universities, hotels, resorts, and clubs across India.

From concept to completion, our expert team works with you to meet your specific requirement within the budget and timeline.

Be it an agility or cross-fit zone, cardio or multi-gyms, group exercises, sprint tracks, spinning studios or any area in the gym – we outfit your gyms with surfaces that deliver the performance you desire.[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1661771747085{padding-right: 30px !important;}”]

Fitness World provides high-quality flooring surfaces in two varieties:

  • Rubber Flooring Tiles are durable enough to withstand heavy impacts and high foot traffic. They are durable, non-slipping, and offer stability and cushioning to the equipment. We have rubber flooring in a stunning array of colours like black, green, brown, black base colour with red spots and many more to suit your gym’s theme or logo. This heavy-duty gymnasium flooring is available in a varied thickness — -10mm, 12mm, 15mm, 20mm, 25mm, 30mm.
  • PVC Or Poly Vinyl Chloride Flooring provides excellent force reduction and is perfect for areas where activities like Zumba, aerobic or yoga are performed. It is available in varied thickness 1.5mm, 2mm, and 3mm.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1661771691148{padding-top: 50px !important;padding-right: 70px !important;padding-bottom: 50px !important;padding-left: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://www.fitness-world.in/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/footer.jpg?id=19830) !important;}”]

    Fill the form to Grab the Offer

    [/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1562758278759{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_column][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1562758287429{padding-right: 25px !important;padding-left: 25px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_column_text]

    A Custom Floor with Trainings Markings Can Inspire Your Members:

    We have the expertise and experience designing gym flooring with company branding and training markings like –

    • Functional compasses
    • Agility ladders
    • Speed circles
    • Line markings
    • Landing dots
    • Four-square pattern etc.

    Your gym floor represents your facility, members, and your programs. A perfectly designed gym floor prevents injuries, minimizes the impact on the ground and prevent damage to your gym equipment. So, make sure to choose Fitness World for your gymnasium flooring needs!

    Contact Fitness World for high-quality gym flooring and professional installation!

    [/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]
